It is a required course for international students in undergraduate program, but an optional for international students in graduate program; 2. International students who pass the TOP Intermediate Level are not allowed to take the course; 3 Attendance at the first class session is mandatory. Students must be present at the first class session to complete the placement test; 4. Students who are non-native speaker of Chinese may take the course to waive the GE Chinese Courses.)
